name: readyserver-static
description: Ready Server static site built with Jinja2, Alpine.js, and Tailwind CSS

scripts.build: python -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt && python build.py && npm run build:css
scripts.build:local: pip install -r requirements.txt && python build.py && npm run build:css
scripts.build:cloudflare: python -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt && python build.py && npm run build:css
scripts.dev: concurrently "python build.py --watch" "npm run watch:css" "npm run serve"
